articles.description: England face Australia in day three of the Test in the Women’s Ashes – follow score updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: Women’s Ashes 2025 LIVE: Australia vs England Test, day three - cricket score, radio & highlights

articles.description: England suffer a humiliating innings defeat in the one-off Ashes Test match as Australia take a 16-0 clean sweep.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: England suffer humiliating innings defeat and lose series 16-0

articles.description: Warren Gatland says Wales will not hide from the importance of a Six Nations trip to face Italy in Rome after they were demolished 43-0 by France.
articles.title: Six Nations: Wales boss Warren Gatland targets Italy game after France result

articles.description: Striker Jhon Duran joins Saudi Pro League side Al-Nassr for a reported £65m from Aston Villa.
articles.title: Aston Villa: Jhon Duran completes £65m move to join Cristiano Ronaldo's Al-Nassr

articles.description: Super agent Mino Raiola's cousin Enzo shares memories of the transfer agent, who died in 2022 but whose legacy lives on.
articles.title: January transfer news: The legacy of transfer king Mino Raiola

articles.description: Six Nations fans are usually made to wait to watch Ireland and England face each other, but not this year as the sides meet in Dublin on the opening weekend.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Ireland host England in opening-weekend blockbuster

articles.description: Aston Villa are one of a number of clubs interested in Manchester United's out-of-favour striker Marcus Rashford.
articles.title: Marcus Rashford: Aston Villa interested in loan deal for Man Utd forward

articles.description: Antoine Dupont inspires France as they cruise to a record opening Six Nations victory against woeful Wales in Paris.
articles.title: France 38-0 Wales: Antoine Dupont inspires hosts to Six Nations victory

articles.description: A spate of injuries has left Scotland without key players as Tom English looks forward to the Six Nations opener against a dangerous Italian side at Murrayfield.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: How Scotland went from title contenders to worried about Italy

articles.description: England captain Jos Buttler questions the use of the concussion replacement rule after defeat by India in the fourth T20.
articles.title: India vs England: Harshit Rana concussion sub questioned by Jos Buttler after hosts' win
